Cheryl Irene Hanna (amụrụ na úbọchị irí nà asaá n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1951) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo. A mụrụ Hanna na Ann Arbor, Michigan, ọ hapụrụ Pratt Institute tupu ya enweta B.A

Hanna bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ede ihe osise n'akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke a makwaara maka ọrụ ya na collage. E gosipụtara ọrụ Hanna na Newark Museum na National Museum of Women in the Arts. Akwụkwọ Hanna nkè 1987, "The Enchanted Hair Tale", na mmekorita ya na onye edemede Alexis de Veaux nwetara onyinye Coretta Scott King. O gosikwara akụkọ ndụ nke Phillis Wheatley, Selma Burke, na Mary Fields.
